This Blog is About

A little girl and her incredibly ordinary life.

Hello❤
My name is Tanya Li.
I am a Libra girl currently live in the heart of Toronto.
I am happly married to my charming Gemini husband Mr Ji.

We also have a handsome samyoed called MiuMiu, as our companion.
He is a half Taurus and half Gemini dog.(⊙v⊙)

There have been so much things going on in our life. I would love to share some of the exciting moments with you.

Welcom to Miliji☻

Please have fund and enjoy it♬


❤XOXO
Love U
Tanya
